document_data.mainbody:
The Dock Ice House was a cold-storage business located on the docks of Ravens Bluff within the citys Harbor District, during the 14 century DR. Its operation was critically important to the local fisheries and seafood vendors, as they allowed their goods to be safely transported throughout the city and beyond.
The Ice House was centrally located within the neighborhoods docks, just a ways north of Gulp Lane in the Silverscales neighborhood.
